articles.title: Key virus strain found in October but its gene study stalled; a new variety appears - The Indian Express
articles.description: Now, a third mutation in the B.1.167 has been identified and experts are hoping that this time, given the alarm bells ringing all around, the pace of intervention and follow-up picks up.
articles.content: The Indian-origin double mutant strain of the coronavirus, B.1.167, that many experts say could be behind the rapid climb of the second Covid wave, was first detected way back in October 5 last year … [+7635 chars]
